app.description: Print the first variants of a VCF.

option.name: count
option.description: number of variants to be printed

option.name: supportConcatenation
option.description: supports a stream of concatenated VCF (cat *.vcf | vcfhead )

documentation.h:pre:
$ curl -s "https://raw.github.com/arq5x/gemini/master/test/test1.snpeff.vcf" |\ java -jar dist/vcfhead.jar -n2 | grep -v "##"
